name: Pacer Trendpilot US Large Cap ETF
description: The Pacer Trendpilot US Large Cap ETF (PSCJ) is an exchange-traded fund that aims to provide investment results that correspond to the performance of the Pacer Trendpilot US Large Cap Index. Launched in 2014, PSCJ employs a systematic investment strategy that shifts between equity exposure and cash based on market trends. The fund primarily invests in large-cap U.S. equities, focusing on companies with strong market capitalizations across various sectors. The investment strategy is designed to capture upside potential in bullish market conditions while mitigating downside risk in bearish environments. The ETF utilizes a trend-following approach, which assesses the direction of the market and adjusts its allocation accordingly. This unique strategy allows investors to participate in equity markets while providing a level of protection during market downturns. The Pacer Trendpilot US Large Cap ETF is an ideal option for investors looking for a balanced approach to equity investing, blending growth potential with risk management. As part of the Pacer family of ETFs, PSCJ is committed to transparency and cost-efficiency, providing investors with an accessible way to diversify their portfolios.
